Summary: Orange orb flying in apparent circular pattern
divs: Sighting Detailswhile driving home to Pella from des Moines, my wife pointed out an Orange orb in the sky far away. after pointing out to her it was a possible ufo we pulled to the side of the road. we realized there were five flying in a straight line. when one would fade away another would appear at the back of the line. I realized they were flying in a circular pattern.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Des Moines
There were no other sightings in Des Moines on or around July 5th 2013
